text: int compare ( int arr [ ] , int i , int size ) { if ( ( i + 1 ) < size ) { if ( arr [ i ] < arr [ i + 1 ] ) return ( 1 + compare ( arr , i + 1 , size ) ) ; else return 0 ; } else return 0 ; } int main ( ) { int size , i , t , n , mm ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( mm = 0 ; mm < n ; mm ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & size ) ; long arr [ size ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < size ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & arr [ i ] ) ; } int sum = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < size - 1 ; i ++ ) { t = compare ( arr , i , size ) ; sum += t ; } printf ( "%d\n" , size + sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
